alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scott County through 1000 PM CST... At 929 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morgan Springs, or 17 miles west of Waldron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Beauchamp... Oliver... Morgan Springs... Bates... Black Fork... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County
